,the,types,of,tests,that,can,use,marking,with,marking,applications,designed,to,accommodate,multiple,choice,written,and,even,video,submissions,for,performance,examinations,marking,software,is,used,by,individual,educational,institutions,and,can,also,be,rolled,out,to,the,participating,schools,of,awarding,exam,organisations,marking,has,been,used,to,mark,many,well,known,high,stakes,examinations,which,in,the,united,kingdom,include,levels,and,gcse,exams,and,in,the,us,includes,the,sat,test,for,college,admissions,ofqual,reports,that,marking,is,the,main,type,of,marking,used,for,general,qualifications,in,the,united,kingdom,in,the,scottish,qualifications,authority,sqa,announced,that,most,of,the,national,question,papers,would,be,marked,in,june,the,odisha,state,government,in,india,announced,that,it,planned,to,use,marking,for,all,plus,ii,papers,from,analytics,the,importance,of,self,assessment,through,tools,made,available,on,educational,technology,platforms,has,been,growing,self,assessment,in,education,technology,relies,on,students,analyzing,their,strengths,weaknesses,and,areas,where,improvement,is,possible,to,set,realistic,goals,in,learning,improve,their,educational,performances,and,track,their,progress,one,of,the,unique,tools,for,self,assessment,made,possible,by,education,technology,is,analytics,analytics,is,data,gathered,on,the,student,activities,on,the,learning,platform,drawn,into,meaningful,patterns,that,leads,to,valid,conclusion,usually,through,the,medium,of,data,visualization,such,as,graphs,expenditure,the,five,key,sectors,of,the,learning,industry,are,consulting,content,technologies,services,and,support,worldwide,learning,was,estimated,in,to,be,over,billion,according,to,conservative,estimates,commercial,growth,has,been,brisk,in,the,worldwide,commercial,market,activity,was,estimated,at,billion,venture,capital,over,the,past,five,years,with,self,paced,learning,generating,billion,in,north,american,learning,generated,billion,in,revenue,in,with,growth,rate,in,cloud,based,authoring ,activity,the,legal,status,of,most,information,security,research,in,the,united,states,is,governed,by,computer,freud,and,abuse,act,cfaa,which,was,derided,to,be,poorly,drafted,and,arbitrarily,enforced,by,enabling,prosecution,of,useful,information,security,research,methods,such,as,nmap,or,shodan,as,even,the,needed,services,fall,into,prohibition,top,level,information,security,experts,find,it,challenging,to,improve,the,infrastructure,of,cyberdefense,cyberattack,as,an,act,of,war,in,the,white,house,published,an,international,strategy,for,cyberspace,that,reserved,the,right,to,use,military,force,in,response,to,cyberattack,in,the,defense,science,board,an,independent,advisory,committee,to,the,secretary,of,defense,went,further,stating,that,the,cyber,threat,is,serious,with,potential,consequences,similar,in,some,ways,to,the,nuclear,threat,of,the,cold,war,and,recommending,in,response,to,the,most,extreme,case,described,as,catastrophic,full,spectrum,cyber,attack,that,nuclear,weapons,would,remain,the,ultimate,response,and,anchor,the,deterrence,ladder,attacks,on,other,nations,iran,in,june,iran,was,the,victim,of,cyber,attack,when,its,nuclear,facility,in,natanz,was,infiltrated,by,the,cyber,worm,stuxnet,said,to,be,the,most,advanced,piece,of,malware,ever,discovered,and,significantly,increases,the,profile,of,cyberwarfare,it,destroyed,perhaps,over,nuclear,centrifuges,and,according,to,business,insider,article,set,tehran,atomic,program,back,by,at,least,two,years,despite,lack,of,official,confirmation,gary,samore,white,house,coordinator,for,arms,control,and,weapons,of,mass,destruction,made,public,statement,in,which,he,said,we,re,glad,they,the,iranians,are,having,trouble,with,their,centrifuge,machine,and,that,we,the,us,and,its,allies,are,doing,everything,we,can,to,make,sure,that,we,complicate,matters,for,them,offering,winking,acknowledgement,of,us,involvement,in,stuxnet,china,in,edward,snowden,former,systems,administrator,for,the,central,intelligence,agency,cia,and,trainer,at,the,defense,intelli in,cellular,the,terms,handover,or,handoff,refer,to,the,process,of,transferring,an,ongoing,call,or,data,session,from,one,channel,connected,to,the,core,network,to,another,channel,in,satellite,communications,it,is,the,process,of,transferring,satellite,control,responsibility,from,one,earth,station,to,another,without,loss,or,interruption,of,service,terminology,american,english,uses,the,term,handoff,and,this,is,most,commonly,used,within,some,american,organizations,such,as,gpp,and,in,american,originated,technologies,such,as,cdma,in,british,english,the,term,handover,is,more,common,and,is,used,within,international,and,european,organisations,such,as,itu,ietf,etsi,and,gpp,and,standardised,within,european,originated,standards,such,as,gsm,and,umts,the,term,handover,is,more,common,than,handoff,in,academic,research,publications,and,literature,while,handoff,is,slightly,more,common,within,the,ieee,and,ansi,organisations,purpose,in,there,may,be,different,reasons,why,handover,might,be,conducted,when,the,phone,is,moving,away,from,the,area,covered,by,one,cell,and,entering,the,area,covered,by,another,cell,the,call,is,transferred,to,the,second,cell,in,order,to,avoid,call,termination,when,the,phone,gets,outside,the,range,of,the,first,cell,when,the,capacity,for,connecting,new,calls,of,given,cell,is,used,up,and,an,existing,or,new,call,from,phone,which,is,located,in,an,area,overlapped,by,another,cell,is,transferred,to,that,cell,in,order,to,free,up,some,capacity,in,the,first,cell,for,other,users,who,can,only,be,connected,to,that,cell,in,non,cdma,networks,when,the,channel,used,by,the,phone,becomes,interfered,by,another,phone,using,the,same,channel,in,different,cell,the,call,is,transferred,to,different,channel,in,the,same,cell,or,to,different,channel,in,another,cell,in,order,to,avoid,the,interference,again,in,non,cdma,networks,when,the,user,behaviour,changes,when,fast,travelling,user,connected,to,large,umbrella,type,of,cell,stops,then,the,call,may,be,transferred,to,smaller,macro,cell,or,even,to,micro,cell,in,order,to,free,capacity,on,the,umbrella,cell,for,other,fast,traveling,users,and,to,reduce,the,potential,interference,to,other,cells,or,users,this,works,in,reverse,too,when,user,is,detected,to,be,moving,faster,than,certain,threshold,the,call,can,be,transferred,to,larger,umbrella,type,of,cell,in,order,to,minimize,the,frequency,of,the,handovers,due,to,this,movement,in,cdma,networks,handover,see,further,down,may,be,induced,in,order,to,reduce,the,interference,to,smaller,neighboring,cell,due,to,the,near,far,effect,even,when,the,phone,still,has,an,excellent,connection,to,its,current,cell,etc,the,most,basic,form,of,handover,is,when,phone,call,in,progress,is,redirected,from,its,current,cell,called,source,to,new,cell,called,target,in,terrestrial,networks,the,source,and,the,target,cells,may,be,served,from,two,different,cell,sites,or,from,one,and,the,same,cell,site,in,the,latter,case,the,two,cells,are,usually,referred,to,as,two,sectors,on,that,cell,site,such,handover,in,which,the,source,and,the,target,are,different,cells,even,if,they,are,on,the,same,cell,site,is,called,inter,cell,handover,the,purpose,of,inter,cell,handover,is,to,maintain,the,call,as,the,subscriber,is,moving,out,of,the,area,covered,by,the,source,cell,and,entering,the,area,of,the,target,cell,special,case,is,possible,in,which,the,source,and,the,target,are,one,and,the,same,cell,and,only,the,used,channel,is,changed,during,the,handover,such,handover,in,which,the,cell,is,not,changed,is,called,intra,cell,handover,the,purpose,of,intra,cell,handover,is,to,change,one,channel,which,may,be,interfered,or,fading,with,new,clearer,or,less,fading,channel,types,in,addition,to,the,above,classification,of,inter,cell,and,intra,cell,classification,of,handovers,they,also,can,be,divided,into,hard,and,soft,handovers,hard,handover,is,one,in,which,the,channel,in,the,source,cell,is,released,and,only,then,the,channel,in,the,target,cell,is,engaged,thus,the,connection,to,the,source,is,broken,before,or,as,the,connection,to,the,tar ines,was,begun,in,and,was,finally,completed,by,the,elephant,butte,irrigation,district,is,historic,district,providing,recognition,and,limited,protection,for,the,history,of,much,of,the,system,which,was,listed,on,the,national,register,of,historic,places,in,the,listing,included,three,contributing,buildings,and,contributing,structures,noted,as,historic,are,the,diversion,dams,and,the,unlined,irrigation,canals,most,of,the,mechanical,fixtures,in,the,system,have,been,routinely,replaced,and,are,non,historic,components,of,the,project,elephant,butte,dam,elephant,butte,dam,the,elephant,butte,dam,also,referred,to,as,elephant,butte,dike,is,the,main,storage,facility,for,the,rio,grande,project,it,is,long,concrete,gravity,dam,standing,above,the,river,and,high,from,its,foundations,the,dam,is,thick,at,the,base,and,tapers,to,about,thick,at,the,crest,the,dam,took,of,material,to,construct,the,full,volume,of,elephant,butte,reservoir,is,some,accounting,for,about,of,the,project,storage,capacity,the,outlet,works,of,the,dam,can,release,while,the,service,spillway,can,release,the,reservoir,and,dam,receive,water,from,catchment,of,about,of,the,rio,grande,total,drainage,area,the,elephant,butte,hydroelectric,station,is,base,load,power,plant,that,draws,water,from,the,reservoir,and,has,capacity,of,megawatts,caballo,dam,caballo,dam,caballo,dam,is,the,second,major,storage,dam,of,the,rio,grande,project,located,about,below,elephant,butte,the,dam,is,high,above,the,river,high,from,its,foundations,and,long,it,forms,the,caballo,reservoir,which,can,store,up,to,of,water,the,outlet,works,can,release,cubic,feet,per,second,while,the,spillway,has,capacity,of,per,second,the,dam,has,no,power,generation,facilities,although,it,has,been,proposed,that,small,hydroelectric,plant,be,installed,at,its,base,for,local,irrigation,districts,percha,diversion,dam,and,rincon,valley,main,canal,percha,diversion,dam,lies,downstream,from,and,west,of,the,caballo,dam,it,consists,of,concrete,overflow,section,flanked,by,earthen,wing,dikes,t ly,due,to,problems,with,crosstalk,distortion,on,clv,extended,play,laserdiscs,pioneer,video,introduced,constant,angular,acceleration,caa,formatting,for,extended,play,discs,caa,is,very,similar,to,clv,save,for,the,fact,that,caa,varies,the,angular,rotation,of,the,disc,in,controlled,steps,instead,of,gradually,slowing,down,in,steady,linear,pace,as,clv,disc,is,read,with,the,exception,of,imation,all,laserdisc,manufacturers,adopted,the,caa,encoding,scheme,although,the,term,was,rarely,if,ever,used,on,any,consumer,packaging,caa,encoding,noticeably,improved,picture,quality,and,greatly,reduced,crosstalk,and,other,tracking,problems,while,being,fully,compatible,with,existing,players,as,pioneer,introduced,digital,audio,to,laserdisc,in,it,further,refined,the,caa,format,caa,was,introduced,in,with,total,playback,capacity,per,side,of,minutes,seconds,reducing,the,video,capacity,to,resolve,bandwidth,issues,with,the,inclusion,of,digital,audio,several,titles,released,between,and,were,analog,audio,only,due,to,the,length,of,the,title,and,the,desire,to,keep,the,film,on,one,disc,back,to,the,future,by,pioneer,had,overcome,the,technical,challenges,and,was,able,to,once,again,encode,in,caa,allowing,total,of,minutes,seconds,pioneer,further,refined,caa,offering,caa,encoding,minutes,of,material,but,filling,the,entire,playback,surface,of,the,side,used,on,only,handful,of,titles,caa,offered,minutes,seconds,of,playback,time,per,side,there,are,handful,of,titles,pressed,by,technidisc,that,used,caa,the,final,variant,of,caa,is,caa,which,could,accommodate,minutes,of,playback,time,per,side,there,are,no,known,uses,of,this,format,on,the,consumer,market,audio,sound,could,be,stored,in,either,analog,or,digital,format,and,in,variety,of,surround,sound,formats,ntsc,discs,could,carry,two,analog,audio,tracks,plus,two,uncompressed,pcm,digital,audio,tracks,which,were,efm,circ,bit,and,khz,sample,rate,pal,discs,could,carry,one,pair,of,audio,tracks,either,analog,or,digital,and,the,digital,tracks,on,pal,disc,were,bit,khz,as,o ,often,in,addition,to,digital,tracks,helping,boost,sound,quality,later,analog,discs,also,applied,cx,noise,reduction,which,improved,the,signal,noise,ratio,of,their,audio,on,dts,disc,digital,pcm,audio,was,not,available,so,if,dts,decoder,was,also,not,available,the,only,option,is,to,fall,back,to,the,analog,dolby,surround,or,stereo,audio,tracks,in,some,cases,the,analog,audio,tracks,were,further,made,unavailable,through,replacement,with,supplementary,audio,such,as,isolated,scores,or,audio,commentary,this,effectively,reduced,playback,of,dts,disc,on,non,dts,equipped,system,to,mono,audio,or,in,handful,of,cases,no,film,soundtrack,at,all,only,one,surround,sound,option,exists,on,given,laserdisc,either,dolby,digital,or,dts,so,if,surround,sound,is,desired,the,disc,must,be,matched,to,the,capabilities,of,the,playback,equipment,ld,player,and,receiver,decoder,by,the,purchaser,fully,capable,laserdisc,playback,system,includes,newer,laserdisc,player,that,is,capable,of,playing,digital,tracks,has,digital,optical,output,for,digital,pcm,and,dts,audio,is,aware,of,ac,audio,tracks,and,has,an,ac,coaxial,output,an,external,or,internal,ac,rf,demodulator,and,ac,decoder,and,dts,decoder,many,receivers,combined,the,ac,decoder,and,dts,decoder,logic,but,an,integrated,ac,demodulator,is,rare,both,in,laserdisc,players,and,in,later,receivers,pal,laserdiscs,have,slightly,longer,playing,time,than,ntsc,discs,but,have,fewer,audio,options,pal,discs,only,have,two,audio,tracks,consisting,of,either,two,analog,only,tracks,on,older,pal,lds,or,two,digital,only,tracks,on,newer,discs,in,comparison,later,ntsc,lds,are,capable,of,carrying,four,tracks,two,analog,and,two,digital,on,certain,releases,one,of,the,analog,tracks,is,used,to,carry,modulated,ac,signal,for,channel,audio,for,decoding,and,playback,by,newer,ld,players,with,an,ac,rf,output,however,older,ntsc,lds,made,before,such,as,the,original,discovision,discs,only,have,two,analog,audio,tracks,laserdisc,players,top,loading,magnavox,brand,laserdisc,player,with,the,lid,o y,specialists,can,vastly,reduce,the,incidence,of,artifacts,depending,on,playing,time,and,image,complexity,by,the,end,of,laserdisc,run,dvds,were,living,up,to,their,potential,as,superior,format,dvds,use,compressed,audio,formats,such,as,dolby,digital,and,dts,for,multichannel,sound,most,laserdiscs,were,encoded,with,stereo,often,dolby,surround,cd,quality,audio,bit,khz,tracks,as,well,as,analog,audio,tracks,dts,encoded,laserdiscs,have,dts,soundtracks,of,kbit,instead,of,the,reduced,bitrate,of,kbit,commonly,employed,on,dvds,with,optional,dts,audio,advantages,laserdisc,players,can,provide,great,degree,of,control,over,the,playback,process,unlike,many,dvd,players,the,transport,mechanism,always,obeys,commands,from,the,user,pause,fast,forward,and,fast,reverse,commands,are,always,accepted,barring,of,course,malfunctions,there,were,no,user,prohibited,options,where,content,protection,code,instructs,the,player,to,refuse,commands,to,skip,specific,part,such,as,fast,forwarding,through,copyright,warnings,some,dvd,players,particularly,higher,end,units,do,have,the,ability,to,ignore,the,blocking,code,and,play,the,video,without,restrictions,but,this,feature,is,not,common,in,the,usual,consumer,market,with,cav,laserdiscs,the,user,can,jump,directly,to,any,individual,frame,of,video,simply,by,entering,the,frame,number,on,the,remote,keypad,feature,not,common,among,dvd,players,some,dvd,players,have,cache,features,which,stores,certain,amount,of,the,video,in,ram,which,allows,the,player,to,index,dvd,as,quickly,as,an,ld,even,down,to,the,frame,in,some,players,damaged,spots,on,laserdisc,can,be,played,through,or,skipped,over,while,dvd,will,often,become,unplayable,past,the,damage,some,newer,dvd,players,feature,repair,skip,algorithm,which,alleviates,this,problem,by,continuing,to,play,the,disc,filling,in,unreadable,areas,of,the,picture,with,blank,space,or,frozen,frame,of,the,last,readable,image,and,sound,the,success,of,this,feature,depends,upon,the,amount,of,damage,laserdisc,players,when,working,in,full,analo to,market,recordable,laserdisc,devices,on,the,consumer,market,even,though,the,competing,vcr,devices,could,record,onto,cassette,which,hurt,sales,worldwide,the,inconvenient,disc,size,the,high,cost,of,both,the,players,and,the,media,and,the,inability,to,record,onto,the,discs,combined,to,take,serious,toll,on,sales,and,contributed,to,the,format,poor,adoption,figures,although,the,laserdisc,format,was,supplanted,by,dvd,by,the,late,many,ld,titles,are,still,highly,coveted,by,movie,enthusiasts,for,example,disney,song,of,the,south,which,is,unavailable,in,the,us,in,any,format,but,was,issued,in,japan,on,ld,this,is,largely,because,there,are,many,films,that,are,still,only,available,on,ld,and,many,other,ld,releases,contain,supplementary,material,not,available,on,subsequent,dvd,versions,of,those,films,until,the,end,of,many,titles,were,released,on,vhs,ld,and,dvd,in,japan,further,developments,and,applications,computer,control,in,the,early,philips,produced,laserdisc,player,model,adapted,for,computer,interface,dubbed,professional,in,jasmine,multimedia,created,laserdisc,jukeboxes,featuring,music,videos,from,michael,jackson,duran,duran,and,cyndi,lauper,when,connected,to,pc,this,combination,could,be,used,to,display,images,or,information,for,educational,or,archival,purposes,for,example,thousands,of,scanned,medieval,manuscripts,this,strange,device,could,be,considered,very,early,equivalent,of,cd,rom,in,the,mid,lucasfilm,pioneered,the,editdroid,non,linear,editing,system,for,film,and,television,based,on,computer,controlled,laserdisc,players,instead,of,printing,dailies,out,on,film,processed,negatives,from,the,day,shoot,would,be,sent,to,mastering,plant,to,be,assembled,from,their,minute,camera,elements,into,minute,film,segments,these,were,then,mastered,onto,single,sided,blank,laserdiscs,just,as,dvd,would,be,burnt,at,home,today,allowing,for,much,easier,selection,and,preparation,of,an,edit,decision,list,edl,in,the,days,before,video,assist,was,available,in,cinematography,this,was,the,only,other,way,fi y,players,and,discs,were,never,officially,sold,in,north,america,although,several,distributors,imported,muse,discs,along,with,other,import,titles,terminator,judgment,day,lawrence,of,arabia,league,of,their,own,bugsy,close,encounters,of,the,third,kind,bram,stoker,dracula,and,chaplin,were,among,the,theatrical,releases,available,on,muse,lds,several,documentaries,including,one,about,formula,one,at,japan,suzuka,circuit,were,also,released,picture,discs,picture,discs,have,artistic,etching,on,one,side,of,the,disc,to,make,the,disc,more,visually,attractive,than,the,standard,shiny,silver,surface,this,etching,might,look,like,movie,character,logo,or,other,promotional,material,sometimes,that,side,of,the,ld,would,be,made,with,colored,plastic,rather,than,the,clear,material,used,for,the,data,side,picture,disc,lds,only,had,video,material,on,one,side,as,the,picture,side,could,not,contain,any,data,picture,discs,are,rare,in,north,america,ld,pioneer,electronics,one,of,the,format,largest,supporters,investors,was,also,deeply,involved,in,the,karaoke,business,in,japan,and,used,laserdiscs,as,the,storage,medium,for,music,and,additional,content,such,as,graphics,this,format,was,generally,called,ld,while,several,other,karaoke,labels,manufactured,laserdiscs,there,was,nothing,like,the,breadth,of,competition,in,that,industry,that,exists,now,as,almost,all,manufacturers,have,transitioned,to,cd,discs,anamorphic,laserdiscs,with,the,release,of,televisions,in,the,early,pioneer,and,toshiba,decided,that,it,was,time,to,take,advantage,of,this,aspect,ratio,squeeze,lds,were,enhanced,ratio,widescreen,laserdiscs,during,the,video,transfer,stage,the,movie,was,stored,in,an,anamorphic,squeezed,format,the,widescreen,movie,image,was,stretched,to,fill,the,entire,video,frame,with,less,or,none,of,the,video,resolution,wasted,to,create,letterbox,bars,the,advantage,was,greater,vertical,resolution,compared,to,letterboxed,widescreen,laserdisc,this,same,procedure,was,used,for,anamorphic,dvds,but,unlike,all,dvd,players,very,few,ld
